strings:
<center>High Priest Rolo is filled with
<center>remorse and repents day and night
<center>for his past transgressions.

<center>One day, completely out of the blue,
<center><hero> has a peculiar dream.

<center>It's a memory, really, of a day
<center>many years earlier, when a certain
<center>young boy met a certain young girl
<center>for the very first time...
<voice_0x010014D8><se_low>King Trode: How fares my dear Medea?
<voice_0x010014D9><se_high>*: Oh, Your Majesty, it's been such a terrible shock to her.
<voice_0x010014DA><se_high>*: She's barely touched a morsel of food since it happened.
<voice_0x010014DB><se_low>King Trode: Oh dear, what to do, what to do...
